attributes.action: investigate Paypal (Europe) Uk and its business practices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to urge the Department of Trade and Industry to carry out a thorough investigation into Paypal in particular its business practices with respect to member accounts and their misuse, member account handling and its complaints procedures. The DFT should undertake this in conjunction with other relevant bodies such as the FSA and National Consumers Council.
